predicate.note: Frames file for 'hustle' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to act or cause to proceed quickly

example.name: without argA
example.text: These days he hustles to house-painting jobs in his Chevy pickup before and after training with the Tropics.
example.arg: before and after training with the Tropics

example.name: justifying argA
example.text: Mary hustled John off to school promptly at 7:30 pm.
